    Mario Fusco

    • Method Detail

      • nullSafeCompare

        public static int nullSafeCompare(Object o1,
                  Object o2)
        Compares 2 objects in a null safe way
        Parameters:
        o1 - The first object to be compared
        o2 - The second object to be compared
        Returns:
        A positive number if the first object is bigger than the second, a negative if is lesser or zero if they are equal
